Articles.Content: Is there a mod that lets you treat the fuel cells as H2O Fuel Cells, capture the water and split that product back up into LFO?

Law of Conservation of Energy: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, but it can be transferred or transformed from one form to another.

What you suggest would be to create an infinite self regenerating power source, which is impossible. To create electricity, fuel must be consumed.

Law of Conservation of Energy: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, but it can be transferred or transformed from one form to another.

What you suggest would be to create an infinite self regenerating power source, which is impossible. To create electricity, fuel must be consumed.

Maybe I didn't phrase that properly, I was talking about using electric charge to do the trick. Charge that can come from an RTG or Solar Panels or wherever.

It looks like a real ISRU, there is mod for RSS/RO with a water electrolysis feature.

Don't call it 'fuelcell reuse', fuelcells are meant for electricity production.
